name: Hyprnote
long_description: Hyprnote is a privacy-first AI notetaker for compliance-sensitive enterprises. It runs fully on-device or on-prem, ensuring that no meeting data ever leaves your system. Hyprnote transcribes and summarizes conversations automatically, turning discussions into actionable knowledge without risking security or regulatory breaches. Unlike cloud-based tools like Granola or Otter, Hyprnote is built for industries where data control is non-negotiable - finance, healthcare, government, and beyond.
one_liner: Privacy-first AI notetaker for enterprises - think open-source Granola
